boardgame.name: The Duke
boardgame.description: Levy. Maneuver. Conquer._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Duke is a dynamic, tile-based strategy game with an old-world, feudal theme, high-quality wooden playing pieces, and an innovative game mechanism in its double-sided tiles. Each side represents a different posture _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; often considered to be defensive or offensive _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and demonstrates exactly what the piece can do within the turn. At the end of a move (or after the use of a special ability), the tile is flipped to its other side, displaying a new offensive or defensive posture._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each posture conveys different options for maneuver and attack. The full circle is a standard Move, the hollow circle the Jump, the arrow provides for the Slide, the star a special Strike ability and so on. Each turn a player may select any tile to maneuver, attempting to defend his own troops while positioning himself to capture his opponent's tiles. If you end your movement in a square occupied by an opponent's tile, you capture that tile. Capture your opponent's Duke to win!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players start the game by placing their Duke in one of the two middle squares on their side of the game board. Two Footman are then placed next to the Duke. Each turn a player may choose to either move a single tile or randomly draw a new tile from the bag. With fifteen different Troop Tiles, all double-sided, and nineteen total pieces for each player (plus special optional tiles), the variety of game play is limitless._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Beyond the endless variety of the basic game, Terrain Tiles introduce a variety of game play options, altering the game board. These rules also include several alternate objectives, such as the challenging Dark Rider game which pits five Pikeman against a lone Knight._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Kickstarter

Catalyst Game Labs (CYT13000) The politics of the high court are elegant, shadowy and subtle. Not so in the outlying duchies. Rival dukes contend for unclaimed lands far from the king_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s reach, and possession is the law in these lands. Use your forces to capture enemy troops before you lose the chance to claim the land for yourself. In The Duke, players move their troop tiles around the board and flip them over after each move. Each tile_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s side shows a different movement pattern. If you end your movement in a square occupied by an opponent_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s tile, you capture it. Capture your opponent_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Duke to win!
+ Moonbase Alpha Intended for user ORANGEMOOSE
The Duke English first edition Publisher: Catalyst Game Labs
English version

New in shrink wrap. Canadians will be charge applicable taxes. Orders will be processed the same day and shipped by expedited parcel. You will be charged exact shipping plus $2 for packing material. Shipped from N2B 1J4. Local pickups welcome. Orders may be combined and orders over $150 will be shipped in Canada free or in the US for a $10 flat fee. Orders must be placed at the same time. We ship the day we receive payment!!! We currently only accept PayPal. Our prices are up to 30% or more off US MRSP.
2 players (Catalist Game Lab) Languages: English
Reserved for Dumon. Per our GM communications. Please add the shipping of your choice, as discussed.

Kickstarter edition, open but unplayed. Gorgeous! Includes the following: 1. leather playing surface (plus regular game board) 2. exclusive green tiles (beautiful!) (3 sets of tiles, dark brown, light brown, and green) 3. wooden storage box (plus regular game box, if desired) 4. Robin Hood expansion 5. King Arthur expansion 6. Three Musketeers expansion 7. Robert E Howard (Conan) expansion 8. Designer set expansion 9. Shieldmaiden tiles (2) Plus Kickstarter exclusives: Specter tile Dragon tile Jester tiles
